name: Shadow Fiend
title: Nevermore
lore: It is said that Nevermore the Shadow Fiend has the soul of a poet, but in truth, he has thousands of souls.

shadowraze.name: Shadowraze
shadowraze.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground at three distances, dealing damage and stacking debuffs.

necromastery.name: Necromastery
necromastery.description: Shadow Fiend steals the souls of enemies he kills, gaining bonus damage per soul.

presenceOfDarkLord.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
presenceOfDarkLord.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

requiem.name: Requiem of Souls
requiem.description: Captured souls explode outward, dealing damage and fearing enemies. More souls = more lines.

15: -2 Presence of the Dark Lord Armor
